Q_DESC:
You are given 3colors(G-Green,  Y-Yellow and R-Red).There are 4 circles (c1, c2, c3 and c4) such that the circle c1 has a link to c2 and c3.(ie. c1,c2 & c3 are adjacent) Circle c2 has a link to c3, c4 other than c1. 

Circle c4 has a link to c3 other than c2. c1 and c2 comes on the upper plane and c3, c4 lower respectively. 

Write a program to color the circles in such a way that no two adjacent circles has the same color.
TESTCASE_1:
4
5

0 1
0 2
1 2
1 3
2 3
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Vertex[1] : Green
Vertex[2] : Yellow
Vertex[3] : Red
Vertex[4] : Green
